import {useState} from "react"; import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; export function Modal({setShowModal, item, infoArr}){ const navigate = useNavigate() const [count, setCount] = useState(1) return ( <>
setShowModal(false)}>
navigate(0)}> {infoArr[1]}
setShowModal(false)}>
{item.title}
{item.composition}
{count} {item.price}֏
{item.type? item.type.map((el, index)=>
el.typeName
):''}
) }
